thread.title: Cal basketball shaping up well under strength coach Christopher
thread.title_full: Cal basketball shaping up well under strength coach Christopher - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Connor Letourneau
title: Cal basketball shaping up well under strength coach Christopher
text:
Because he doesn’t know when inspiration will strike, Nicodemus Christopher keeps a pen and notepad in the nightstand next to his bed. Sometimes, in early-morning hours, the bleary-eyed strength and conditioning coach for Cal men’s basketball jots down ideas for workouts.
